updateSingle:
UPDATE NOTIFIER SET
            subscriber_id=@subscriber_id,
owner_group_id=@owner_group_id,
source=@source
            WHERE notifier_id=@notifier_id
getSingle:
SELECT T.rowid,T.* FROM NOTIFIER T
            WHERE T.notifier_id=@notifier_id
getLast: SELECT T.rowid,T.* FROM NOTIFIER T HAVING T.rowid=MAX(T.rowid)
getByRowid: SELECT T.rowid,T.* FROM NOTIFIER T WHERE T.rowid=@rowid
countAll: SELECT MAX(rowid) as last_id,COUNT(*) as records FROM NOTIFIER
selectBYsubscriber_id:
SELECT T.rowid,T* FROM NOTIFIER T 
          WHERE subscriber_id=@subscriber_id
countBYsubscriber_id:
SELECT MAX(rowid) as last_id,COUNT(*) as records FROM NOTIFIER 
          WHERE subscriber_id=@subscriber_id
selectBYowner_group_id:
SELECT T.rowid,T* FROM NOTIFIER T 
          WHERE owner_group_id=@owner_group_id
countBYowner_group_id:
SELECT MAX(rowid) as last_id,COUNT(*) as records FROM NOTIFIER 
          WHERE owner_group_id=@owner_group_id
